discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
git tag v.3.0.5
git push origin v.3.0.5

questions.question_text:
You have a GitHub repository.

You need to create a tag named v3.0.5 and ensure that the tag is available in the remote repository.

Which two commands should you run? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.B: Create a branch protection rule for the feature branches.
choices.D: Create a branch protection rule for the main branch.

questions.question_text:
You have a GitHub repository.

You need to ensure that all changes to code are validated by your company’s security department before the main branch is deployed.

Which two actions can you perform? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
D and E are correct answers.
https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/customizing-your-repository/about-code-owners#codeowners-and-branch-protection

Selected Answer: DE
D and E , A is not needed it only matters who can approve

Selected Answer: AD
I think A & D

comments.content:
Sorry, the given answer is correct:
D. 
E. Create a CODEOWNERS file. This defines who can approve changes to specific parts of the code, ensuring that necessary validations are performed by the security department or other relevant teams.

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

You have a .NET app named App1.

You need to upload App1 to GitHub Packages.

How should you complete the command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

DRAG DROP
-

You have a GitHub repository named repo1 and an Azure key vault named kv1.

In repo1, you plan to create a workflow named Workflow1 that will deploy a database server by using credentials stored in kv1.

You need to ensure that Workflow1 can retrieve the credentials from kv1.

Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.

NOTE: More than one order of answer choices is correct. You will receive credit for any of the correct orders you select.

//IMG//

Your company is building a new solution in Java.
The company currently uses a SonarQube server to analyze the code of .NET solutions.
You need to analyze and monitor the code quality of the Java solution.
Which task types should you add to the build pipeline?

discussion.content:
Maven OR Gradle is correct
Grunt and Glup are for JS
Cocopod is for Objective C

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.

https://docs.sonarqube.org/latest/devops-platform-integration/azure-devops-integration/
Under Choose a way to run the analysis, select Integrate with Maven or Gradle.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
C is correct answer.
